data.name: Dis Pontibus 2
data.detailed_description:
Dis Pontibus 2 is a single-player puzzle game set in a procedurally-generated archipelago.

In this sequel to the first adventure, you are tasked with helping the archipelago's inhabitants by repairing their bridges, pushing and/or rotating their platforms.

But platforms are more fragile in this world! You can move them only a limited number of times.

Each game will be a different experience, with simple mechanics but very challenging gameplay.
data.about_the_game:
Dis Pontibus 2 is a single-player puzzle game set in a procedurally-generated archipelago.

In this sequel to the first adventure, you are tasked with helping the archipelago's inhabitants by repairing their bridges, pushing and/or rotating their platforms.

But platforms are more fragile in this world! You can move them only a limited number of times.

Each game will be a different experience, with simple mechanics but very challenging gameplay.
data.short_description: A single-player game set in a archipelago full of puzzles.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

  • Storage: 400 MB available space
